articles.author: Aditya Maheshwari
articles.title: 'Why is he Being Made the Scapegoat for Our Batting Failures?': Sunil Gavaskar Slams Selectors For Dropping - News18
articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar suggested that other Indian batters Rohit Sharma (15 and 43), Virat Kohli (14 and 49), and Shubman Gill (13 and 18) also failed on the big occasion against Australia.
articles.content: Batting great Sunil Gavaskar lashed out at the Indian selectors for dropping Cheteshwar Pujara from the Test squad for the upcoming two-match Test series against West Indies. Gavaskar slammed the sel… [+2503 chars]
